title: Complete Guide to Making Lizard in Little Alchemy 1 and 2

steps.title: Combine Egg + Swamp to create Lizard.
steps.content: Combine Egg + Swamp to create Lizard. If you don't have those elements unlocked, you'll just need to combine a few of the base elements beforehand. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create Lizard: Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Air + Fire = Energy Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Life + Stone = Egg Egg + Swamp = Lizard

steps.title: Combine Stone + Animal to create Lizard.
steps.content: Combine Stone + Animal to create Lizard. You can create this element with or without Time , which is unlocked by discovering at least 100 elements. Here's the fastest way to create Lizard: With Time : Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Earth + Earth = Land Life + Land = Animal Stone + Animal = Lizard Without Time : Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Earth + Earth = Land Life + Land = Animal Stone + Animal = Lizard

steps.title: Lizard can be used to create other elements in Little Alchemy 1 and 2.
steps.content: Lizard can be used to create other elements in Little Alchemy 1 and 2. Be sure to use the recipes for the version you're using. Little Alchemy 1 : Lizard + Swamp or River = Alligator Lizard + Rainbow = Chameleon Lizard + Time = Dinosaur Lizard + Fire = Dragon Lizard + Lizard or Oval = Egg Little Alchemy 2 : Lizard + Swamp or River or Lake = Alligator Lizard + Rainbow or Double rainbow = Chameleon Lizard + Sand = Desert Lizard + Time or Big = Dinosaur Lizard + Fire or Air or Sky or Airplane or Story or Legend = Dragon Lizard + Lizard = Egg Lizard + Monster (DLC) = Salamander (DLC)
